messages.message: Hi, I found your portfolio site. Are you available for freelance work?
Hey! Yes, I'm available. What kind of project do you have in mind?
I'm looking to build a simple landing page for my product.
Nice! Do you already have a design or should I help with that too?
A little of both, I have a rough wireframe. Can you polish it?
Absolutely. Iâ€™ll also optimize it for mobile. Want animations or just static design?
